title: Interesting flash/typography site
content:
I just stumbled onto this interesting little experimental-looking site. You won't find any "fine" typography, but it's pretty interesting:  
 [http://typeflash.com/swfs/temp.php?var1=&var2=&var3=GERMAN](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012114706/http:/typeflash.com/swfs/temp.php?var1=&var2=&var3=GERMAN "http://typeflash.com/swfs/temp.php?var1=&var2=&var3=GERMAN")

Has anyone seen this yet?
author: Chipman223

comments.content: From the looks of the Gallery it seems great, but typing doesn't work on my Mac Firefox.
Hmm, works with me on firefox. Try Safari?
Neat little find there chipman. Thanks for sharing
